title: Dashboard V2 — final QA pass
description: Complete final QA testing of all Dashboard V2 features before launch.
notes: QA in progress. Export bug (TC-990) found during testing.

title: Dashboard V2 — performance benchmarks on production data
description: Validate 50% performance improvement claim on production-scale data (2M+ rows).
notes: Previous benchmark was 10K rows on staging only. Need 2M row validation. Postponed last week due to incident.

title: Dashboard V2 — support training materials
description: Create training docs, FAQ, and troubleshooting guide for support team.
notes: Support team has NOT been briefed. Lisa Park needs materials by Thursday.

title: Dashboard V2 — marketing copy review
description: Review press release and marketing materials for technical accuracy.
notes: Press release claims: real-time analytics, 50% faster, WCAG AA compliant. Need to verify ALL claims.

title: Dashboard V2 — WCAG AA accessibility fix
description: Fix contrast ratio issue in dark mode data table and filter panel. Currently 3.8:1, needs 4.5:1.
notes: Design sign-off was 'with reservations'. 12 components need updating. 2-day effort minimum.

title: P1 BUG: Export drops rows on filtered datasets > 50K
description: Dashboard V2 data export silently drops rows when exporting filtered datasets larger than 50K rows. CSV is incomplete.
notes: LAUNCH BLOCKER. Root cause: cursor pagination off-by-one with filters. ETA fix: Thursday.

title: Dashboard V2 — CI/CD pipeline + rollback plan
description: Ensure deployment pipeline is ready and rollback plan is tested.

title: Dashboard V2 — launch readiness assessment
description: Compile go/no-go assessment covering engineering, marketing, support, and design readiness.
notes: Due Wednesday. David wants specific blockers and honest assessment.
